sentences.en: Already a lecture in Egypt by a former curator has been canceled.
sentences.cn: 目前已经有一名前罗浮宫主管人员,预计在埃及发表的演说被迫取消.

sentences.en: Beijing Commune was founded by critic and curator Leng Lin in 2004.
sentences.cn: 北京公社由评论家与策划人冷林先生创建于2004年.

sentences.en: Curator conducted the visitors round the museum.
sentences.cn: 馆长领着游客们在博物馆中参观.

sentences.en: From the archaized visiting card, he is a curator of a museum.
sentences.cn: 从他的仿古名剌上看, 他的头衔是博物馆馆长.

sentences.en: Gleen Cordinier is curator of the Whaling Museum here in Mystic , Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 格伦·迪尼埃是此地康涅狄格州米斯蒂克的捕鲸博物馆馆长.

sentences.en: He’s Curator of Prints at the Metropolitan.
sentences.cn: 他是大都会艺术博物馆印刷品馆部的主管。

sentences.en: James Phillips, curator of near east and north african exhibits, said little was known about the origins of the model.
sentences.cn: 近东和北非展厅的管理者詹姆斯? 菲利普斯说关于这尊模特的起源人们知之甚少。

sentences.en: Jose Maenads , the curator , was making the rounds , checking to see that everything was all right.
sentences.cn: 管理员约瑟夫?曼尼代斯正在转来转去, 检查是否一切正常.

sentences.en: On hands and knees, the curator froze, turning his head slowly.
sentences.cn: 馆长双手支地,跪在那里, 僵直着,慢慢的把头扭向说话的人.

sentences.en: On his hands and knees , the curator froze, turning his head slowly.
sentences.cn: 馆长双手撑着地,跪在那里, 呆若木鸡,好半天才转过头去.

sentences.en: Our curator is an expert on the research of bronzeware.
sentences.cn: 我们馆长是研究青铜器的专家.

sentences.en: Peter Forey is curator of fossil fishes at the Natural History Museum.
sentences.cn: 彼得·福雷是自然历史博物馆鱼类化石展厅的负责人。

sentences.en: The curator conducted the visitors round the museum.
sentences.cn: 馆长领着游客在博物馆参观.

sentences.en: The curator conducted us round the museum.
sentences.cn: 馆长带领我们在博物馆各处参观.

sentences.en: The curator lay a moment, gasping for breath, taking stock.
sentences.cn: 馆长在地上躺了片刻, 喘着粗气, 四下看了看.

sentences.en: The curator was to be jointly appointed by two parties.
sentences.cn: 济助令规定的临时管理人则由诉讼双方共同指定.

sentences.en: When in Rome stars Kristen Bell as an art curator.
sentences.cn: 克莉丝汀.贝尔担纲演出《身在罗马》(暂译),饰演一名艺术策展人.

words.tran_cn: 馆长的；管理者的；评议员的
评议员的地位；管理者的职务

trans.tran_cn: （图书馆等的）馆长，监护人，管理者，<英>（大学）学监，校董会中的财务保管员
trans.tran_en: someone who is in charge of a  museum  or zoo
